short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extention replaces common English words with their IPA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extention replaces common English words with their IPA.

More specifically,
(1) this replaces English words on web pages with their IPA (only when enabled), and
(2) this enables users to see IPA of an English word by inputting "ipa <English word>" on the address bar.
